attributes.action: Make Freeview for the masses and not Sky TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the last couple of months Sky TV have crippled freeview and Virgin Media with bully boy tactics.

I want the PM to investigate Sky and the way it is influencing what goes on Freeview and the way they are adding subscription channels to a SUPPOSEDLY FREE SERVICE. To top this off the proposed move by SKY means that any current Freeview boxes and intergrated TV's will be come obsolete.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
